content.registrationTextTwo: You're now up and running! Some of the benefits of your new account are:
content.benefitsOne: Ability to save your address for seamless checkout
content.benefitsTwo: View all your past orders and keep up to date with your current ones
content.benefitsThree: Be the first to hear about our sale or promotional events
content.registrationTextFour: If you're signed up to our mailing list you'll soon start to receive emails on all the latest styles, content, special events and news from Gotham. If not, come and join us here.
content.registrationTextFive: For any questions, please feel free to contact us at any time, we're here to help at our FAQs page or contacat us.
